content.title: You can always feel product/market fit when it's happening
content.author: Marc Andreessen

generation.prompt: Christopher Nolan style cinematic realism with practical effects aesthetic, dramatic architectural perspectives emphasizing scale and geometry, high-contrast naturalistic lighting with deep shadows, wide-angle establishing shots showing spatial relationships, visual metaphors for time and space through environmental design, IMAX-quality photographic clarity.
